properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:02AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
Light rain will gradually spread over the North Country by mid
morning. Though temperatures over much of Jefferson county,
including at Watertown and Fort Drum, are in the 40s, a shallow
layer of cold air near the St. Lawrence River is keeping readings
there around freezing. As the steady rain moves in this morning,
some freezing rain is possible near the Saint Lawrence River.
Untreated roads and elevated surfaces could see minor ice
accumulations of less than one-tenth of an inch. If traveling this
morning near the Saint Lawrence River, plan on the potential for
icy conditions.

NWSheadline: FREEZING RAIN POSSIBLE NEAR THE SAINT LAWRENCE RIVER THIS MORNING
